mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event( codename, title, place, org_name, use_trgt, use_fee, player, program, etc_desc, org_link, main_img, rgstdate, ticke, strtdate, end_date, themecode) values( #{codename}, #{title}, #{place}, #{org_name}, #{use_trgt}, #{use_fee}, #{player}, #{program}, #{etc_desc}, #{org_link}, #{main_img}, #{rgstdate}, #{ticke}, #{strtdate}, #{end_date}, #{themecode};
